graphic.content:
Click keys or type to add symbols
to the score above.

Click tabs to the left or press tab
to switch between keyboards.

Mouse over the keyboard for help.
IPA characters are separated from literary and music braille\nusing beginning/ending markers.\nDiacritics are placed after the letter they modify.

To include text, use literary braille.
If music and text is mixed on a single
line, use the Text Prefix and Music
Prefix to switch between systems.
